com.bmwcarit.barefoot.roadmap

Class Road

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.topology.AbstractEdge<Road>
      • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.roadmap.Road
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Road
extends AbstractEdge<Road>
    Directed road wrapper of BaseRoad objects in a directed road map (RoadMap). *

    Note: Since Road objects are directional representations of BaseRoad objects, each BaseRoad is split into two Road objects. For that purpose, it uses the identifier i of each BaseRoad to define identifiers of the respective Road objects, where i * 2 is the identifier of the forward directed Road and i * 2 + 1 of the backward directed Road.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
